details.design_style: Clean and focused with minimal distractions.
details.content_features: Clear value proposition, prominent call-to-action, and optional social proof elements.
details.mobile_styling: Simplified layout with a stacked design, ensuring the call-to-action and value proposition remain above the fold.

usefulness: Perfect for landing pages, lead generation campaigns, or services focused on clear user actions.

details.design_style: Focus on highlighting products with a visually appealing grid layout.
details.content_features: Featured product section, benefits grid, customer testimonials, clear pricing, and multiple call-to-action points.
details.mobile_styling: Grid restructured into a single-column format for easy scrolling, with CTAs placed at the bottom of each section for accessibility.

usefulness: Best suited for e-commerce platforms, SaaS products, or brands emphasizing detailed product features.

details.design_style: Engaging layout with a hero video as the focal point.
details.content_features: Video section supported by key features, social proof elements, and clear next steps.
details.mobile_styling: Video resized or replaced with a static image, ensuring fast load times on mobile devices.

usefulness: Ideal for brands wanting to showcase their story, product demonstrations, or high-impact marketing campaigns.

details.design_style: Full-screen hero image with overlay text for a striking first impression.
details.content_features: Bold headline, subheadline, and a clear call-to-action layered over the image.
details.mobile_styling: Image cropped for better focus, and overlay text resized for readability on smaller screens.

usefulness: Great for creative portfolios, photography websites, or brands emphasizing strong visuals.

details.design_style: Interactive and dynamic with elements that respond to scrolling.
details.content_features: Layered design featuring animations, dynamic text, and interactive call-to-action buttons.
details.mobile_styling: Animations simplified or replaced with static content for performance optimization on mobile devices.

usefulness: Best for innovative brands, tech companies, or creative agencies aiming for a modern, high-tech impression.
